about_the_game: Moonshadows is a 2D Turn-Based RPG set in Eveshame Forest, a soft horror, dark surrealist forest that’s hellbent on preventing Harlow and friends’ escape. Inspired by cult-classic indie RPGs, Moonshadows features a streamlined yet thoughtful turn-based RPG system with a multidimensional story that unravels over multiple playthroughs, creating a replayable experience within a diverse yet consolidated top-down map. Difficult enemies and vital items and blessings are always nearby, and players must manage their resources and make difficult, calculated decisions when it comes to surviving the forest and reuniting the friends. Players can also enjoy the rich art and immersive soundtracks that bring the mysterious Eveshame Forest to life and set the stage for yet-deeper secrets buried within the hearts of a group of best friends.

short_description: Moonshadows is a streamlined yet thoughtful 2D turn-based RPG where eight friends get lost in Eveshame forest, a still, unforgiving mockery of a forest hellbent on preventing their escape. Reunite the friends and discover the yet-deeper secrets buried within and around them.
